author: beaton
msg: So it turns out that Twitter returns 403 responses when a client is rate
limited.  This causes the oauth proxy to delete oauth tokens.  Not ideal, since
I'm modifying our code so that tokens are only dropped when we get a 401
This looks safe.  I've tested several OAuth service providers, and they all

author: aadamchik

author: gtully
msg: merge -c 835874 - resolve https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2483 and https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2028, keep track of outstanding wakeup requests in a queue with regular task runner avoids build up in determintic task runner. Exposed useDeterministicTaskRunner to validate some test that fail with the -DuseDedicatedTaskRunner=true system property. With broker.useDedicatedTask=false, Queues will use pooled executor for dispatch.
